name: Super Bombardier
description:
Take to the skies as the last fighter in your unit.

Armed with your basic weapons and your trusty homing bombs you are the Super Bombardier, gun down various enemies across 3 levels upgrading your bullets as you dodge the swarms of bullets.

If you are looking for a shooter that is hard as nails than this is for you, if your not we also have easier difficulty settings so you can practice the levels to get truly legendary scores.

Current content:

  • 4 levels
  • 11 bullet upgrades
  • Simple keyboard controls
  • 3 difficulty levels added to ease players into the game

Content coming in next update

  • More levels
  • More work on menus
  • Tell  us what you would like to see
